dcterms:description: A dataset containing 3D co-speech gestures with manual text transcriptions, used to investigate gesture generation linked to speech.

dcterms:description: A dataset comprising audio and motion capture recordings of a male actor speaking freely on various topics, used for training gesture generation models.
dcterms:title: Trinity Gesture Dataset

dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset of synchronized body-finger motion and audio for conversational motion analysis and synthesis.
